title: Avengers 4 News
body:
After the firing of James Gunn Guardians star Dave Bautista has been acting out against Disney if you want to call it that. First he tweeted about the person that outed James Gunn by saying here Disney this is your guy what an inspiration.In the video it has the person responsible admitting to running smear campaigns some of them being false.

https://screenrant.com/dave-bautista-disney-troll-video-james-gunn/

Then he spoils some events of Avengers 4 saying that nobody told him not to give out spoilers. Even thought during filming the Russo brothers were very secretive. He said that he has filmed scenes for Avengers 4. This seems to confirm he is alive but it could be flashbacks or dream sequence. 

https://www.cbr.com/dave-bautista-avengers-4-spoilers/

The firing of James Gunn and postpone of Guardians of the Galaxy 3 could affect Avengers 4. This is because as of now they don’t know what to do with the Guardians characters. I am sure that every thing will be fine and go as plan when it comes to Avengers 4 the Russos said they want to leave you shocked at the end.  They just have to wait for a director for Guardians of the Galaxy 3.

https://www.cbr.com/guardians-3-delay-avengers-4/

Looking to the future we may get two pieces of huge news this month. Grace Randolph said on social media they got insider information from the MCU but is sworn to secrecy. The rumors deal with an Air Force pilot and a billion dollar cat. The pilot is Captain Marvel and the cat is Black Panther. So what we can expect is a trailer for Captain Marvel releasing at the end of this month and the official announcement of Black Panther 2. The trailer would come right on schedule since most first trailers for the MCU drops 5 to 6 months before the movie. And a Black Panther 2 is a lock to happen since the first movie made 1 billion dollars worldwide. Also September is the release of Iron Fist season 2 on Netflix the 7th.

https://comicbook.com/marvel/2018/09/01/captain-marvel-trailer-black-panther-2-september-rumor/

blog.name: yetanothercomicbook
blog.title: Comics
blog.description: Most of the comics I read are Marvels from 1984. Every time I read a comic, I post a comment. That's pretty much it.

title: The Death of Captain Marvel
body:
Marvel Graphic Novel #1

A good story. Simple, mature, emotional.

  • Very little happens. After a battle at the start, we learn that the hero has terminal cancer and watch as he copes with the time he has left.
  • Some people have difficulty dealing with what’s happening. Producing some conflict/drama.
  • Mostly, however, the script ponders life and death.
  • And does a fine, fine job with it.
  • Nothing is forced. Or fake. It’s really the simple story of a man and his lover finding out they don’t have any time left together. And - on that understated level - it’s a heartbreaking read.

10/10

  • Nothing is forced. Or fake. It’s really the simple story of a man and his lover finding out they don’t have any time left together. And - on that understated level - it’s a heartbreaking read.

10/10

Marvel Graphic Novel #1

A good story. Simple, mature, emotional.

  • Very little happens. After a battle at the start, we learn that the hero has terminal cancer and watch as he copes with the time he has left.
  • Some people have difficulty dealing with what’s happening. Producing some conflict/drama.
  • Mostly, however, the script ponders life and death.
  • And does a fine, fine job with it.
  • Nothing is forced. Or fake. It’s really the simple story of a man and his lover finding out they don’t have any time left together. And - on that understated level - it’s a heartbreaking read.

10/10

summary: One of the little details I really like about Morrison’s JLA is that everyone - Batman, Kyle, etc - calls Captain Marvel...
body: One of the little details I really like about Morrison’s JLA is that everyone - Batman, Kyle, etc - calls Captain Marvel ‘Billy,’ except for Superman, who always calls him ‘Will’ or ‘Bill.’

reblog.comment: One of the little details I really like about Morrison’s JLA is that everyone - Batman, Kyle, etc - calls Captain Marvel ‘Billy,’ except for Superman, who always calls him ‘Will’ or ‘Bill.’

trail.content_raw: One of the little details I really like about Morrison’s JLA is that everyone - Batman, Kyle, etc - calls Captain Marvel ‘Billy,’ except for Superman, who always calls him ‘Will’ or ‘Bill.’

summary: MCU CosmicCast Episode 21: Avengers 4 Reshoots, Captain Marvel Trailer, and a Marvel Football Stadium
title: MCU CosmicCast Episode 21: Avengers 4 Reshoots, Captain Marvel Trailer, and a Marvel Football Stadium
body:
Welcome to episode 21 of the MCU CosmicCast!

This week the podcast covers:

  • Due to popular demand, MCU Cosmic T-Shirts are now available through TeePublic.
  • Why Avengers 4 will not feature Fox characters.
  • A football stadium in Australia is now the Marvel stadium.
  • Avengers 4 reshoots.
  • The fervor over when the Captain Marvel trailer will release.
  • A Spider-Man: Far From Home villain rumor.

Questions…

View On WordPress
